TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
8 points left! The incredible closeness is suspenseful!

EDIT: Now 3 - Thanks Yukon0009 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

ADDENDUM: Thanks Dman979! 200 more till I hit light green ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

ADDENDUM II: Now it's around 300+ - Thanks sp1989 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-13T03:03:53Z" title="06/13/2015 03:03  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 13, 2015</time> by Columbia**
Nearly 200...

Woah, I realized I got 29 points in the span of 4 days - Thanks guys ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I KNEW spamming ships in the Spacecraft Exchange was a good idea - Now I can't even fit them all in my sig ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

EDIT: Whoops, accidentally said 329..

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-13T06:41:45Z" title="06/13/2015 06:41  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 13, 2015</time> by Columbia**

> 
> Woah, I realized I got 329 points in the span of 4 days - Thanks guys ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> I KNEW spamming ships in the Spacecraft Exchange was a good idea - Now I can't even fit them all in my sig ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

So is that how one gets tons of rep? Oooo...I have tons of [arrogance]well-made crafts and replicas[/arrogance] I could post...

> 
> So is that how one gets tons of rep? Oooo...I have tons of [arrogance]well-made crafts and replicas[/arrogance] I could post...

I was just kidding around.. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Woah, I realized I got 29 points in the span of 4 days - Thanks guys ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> I KNEW spamming ships in the Spacecraft Exchange was a good idea - Now I can't even fit them all in my sig ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
> 
> EDIT: Whoops, accidentally said 329..

Just an itty-bitty *tiny* difference. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Only nine! The rate has barely slowed!
I have 8 rep. A long way away...
18 points in 8 hours ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) 42 points to a hundred!

59 points to reach 100 rep.

But i'm going to post some crafts within a few days and a reconstruction of the Curiosity.

19 points remaining 'til I hit 700, but it's been rather, umm... quiet. I suppose I should do something to help that along ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Dman, did you really do that?
I have 81 points, only 19 points to two bars ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I'm at 57 points. So I need 43 more. So.... far.... away....
79. My kitten earns more rep than I do!
51... seems like I have to post more craft ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
119. I wasn't active/opinionated enough during The Great PS4 Scare.
64 to next level. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> 64 to next level. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

 6**5** to the next level ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

53 to go for me.

(-11 from Lime's. And it was entirely a coincidence.)

![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Two points left until my last dark-green bar! (398) Almost there!

The suspense!
48 to next bar

Alright, 435 points!

I need around 65 points to make it to the Light-Green Group!
66 points to 3rd bar!

I need 21 points.

Here. I'll just post something rep-worthy. Have some kittens.

![Cute-Kittens-kittens-16094704-1280-800.jpg](http://images4.fanpop.com/image/photos/16000000/Cute-Kittens-kittens-16094704-1280-800.jpg)
